name: Derpibooru Buttons
description:
This extension has two features: 
It adds two buttons to your search bar, one to filter by upvotes and one for faves. They can both be clicked multiple times to cycle through only, not and both. 

It also allows the right clicking of images which will save them to a CSV which can be copied to the clipboard (and logged to the console) by clicking the button in the top bar.
